backend/main.mo: Motoko actor for the backend that stores and retrieves contact form submissions using a Map, exposes submitContactMessage and getContactMessages update/query functions, and returns static ContactInfo for the department.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (Hero, About, Programs, Faculty, etc.) to their source files, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels for the department website.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence descriptions of every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and content of each component, hook, and config file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, card, sidebar, and chart tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, Open Graph properties, and a root div that loads the React app via Vite's module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all page sections (Hero through Contact) with Navigation, Footer, and a Sonner toast provider into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component rendering a department introduction paragraph, Vision and Mission cards with icons, and three highlight cards (Established Year, Intake Capacity, Accreditation) with scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/Achievements.tsx: Achievements section with animated count-up stat cards and subsections listing hackathon wins, research publications, and internship highlights with company and role details.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Contact section component with a form (name, email, subject, message) that submits via a React Query mutation, and displays department contact info (address, email, phone) fetched from an API with fallback defaults.
frontend/src/components/Events.tsx: Events section component that displays hardcoded upcoming events (conference, workshop, hackathon, guest lecture) with badges and past event photo thumbnails in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Faculty.tsx: Faculty section component that renders a grid of hardcoded faculty member cards with avatar images, initials fallback, designation badges, specialization, experience, and email/LinkedIn links.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer component with department branding, social media icon links, quick navigation links with smooth-scroll, and contact info displayed in a four-column grid on a dark navy background.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section with an AI background image, animated floating particles, department title, tagline, CTA buttons scrolling to 'programs' and 'contact' sections, and a stats row.
frontend/src/components/Labs.tsx: Renders a 'Laboratories & Facilities' section with four lab cards (AI Research, Data Analytics, HPC, Smart Classroom), each showing an icon, description, and feature list with scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware active section highlighting, smooth scroll-to-section behavior, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/Placements.tsx: Displays placement statistics (placement rate, average/highest package) with animated count-up cards and a grid of recruiting partner company names.
frontend/src/components/Programs.tsx: Renders the academic programs section featuring a B.Tech in AI & Data Science card with core subjects, electives, and program metadata like seats and credits.
frontend/src/components/Research.tsx: Shows ongoing faculty research projects and student-led projects, each with title, description, team, funding/tags, and status badges.
Reusable wrapper component that uses IntersectionObserver to trigger fade/slide-in animations (up, left, right, or fade) when children enter the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, AuthClient creation, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching contact info, submitting contact messages, and retrieving contact messages from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and Tailwind directives, defining CSS custom properties for a blue/white academic color theme with light/dark mode variants and utility gradient classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based brand colors, typography fonts, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for the academic department site.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state schema, version, architectural notes, existing features, and image requirements for the AI & Data Science department website at Priyadarshini Engineering College.
